description: Details required for conditions 8 (Car Park Management Plan), 10 (Cycle Parking) and 12 (Refuse and Recycling) of planning permission 19/02482/FUL (Change of use of motorcycle show sales units 318, 320 and 312 (Class Sui Generis) to Retail (Class A1). Demolition of the existing ground and first floor rear extensions, ancillary buildings and the 1.5 storey workshop to the side and rear of unit 318 and 320 Ewell Road. Erection of a single, two and three storey extension to the eastern side and rear of the existing building unit 318 and 320 and further internal alterations. Erection of two semi-detached properties to the rear of the site to accommodate 2x retail and 9 residential units with provision of 6 parking spaces and 16 cycle stores)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 8 (Car Park Management Plan) of planning permission 19/02482/FUL the proposal fails to ensure the provision of adequate off-street parking in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policy 6.13 of the London Plan 2016 and policies CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
